name: Floppy Bird (Scoperaider Studios)
description: This Is flappy bird but if some random dude on the internet made it buggy and added hard mode to it. It is a very useless game, but I had learned a lot and had fun making it. Bet you can't get to 10 on hard mode! PS: Gaberial you are a terrible play tester (jk). Anway's, have fun, I will fix the bugs in a couple of days, but I don't know if I will add any new content.
